item.description: At the beginning of each meeting, we have a chance to get to know one another and our professional specialties. We share a potluck lunch, and then have a featured presenter share about his/her work. This month our presentation will be "Less Is More, The Power of Non-Invasive Acupuncture."
item.how_to_find_us: We will welcome you when you arrive!
item.why: Join us for a potluck lunch, colleagueship and community! Meet others who share
item.name: Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies June Meeting: Less Is More
